Description.Text: Located just 2 minutes away from the underground U3, within 3 km`s of Gasometer, Belvedere and Ernst Happel Stadium are also within 5 km distance of the hotel. All 157 rooms offer Wi-Fi connection, hairdryers and TV`s. Whether as an individual, a couple, with friends, or as a family vacation in Vienna, the hotel JUFA Wien City has the perfect offer for everyone. This family oriented Vienna hotel sets whole new standards when it comes to family-focused hotels in Vienna. With an infrastructure designed especially with families in mind, such as Family package, a storage room for prams, the Ravensburger Games Bar, along with a youth corner and chill-out lounge. This hotel features a restaurant, a lounge and a coffee shop. Other amenities include a conference room and a children`s club.
